comment._content: There is a nice account of the 1922 siege of Waterford here The fourth siege of Waterford

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/33577523@N08] There certainly is, Paul, and fascinating about people heading off for the seaside!

Amazing that yours is the very first comment on this one. I love it, but it hasn't had a lot of attention. I think I'll replace it with a higher res version, and who knows, we might be able to identify some of the men.
